key.name: locations
key.summary: Configured cities to show weather for
key.description: The locations shown in the world view of gnome-weather. Each value is a GVariant returned by gweather_location_serialize().

key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the main window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the main window.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether or not the window is maximized.
